def_cn: 令人震惊的;令人愤怒的;骇人听闻的
def_en: A shock horror story is presented in a way that is intended to cause great shock or anger.

def_cn: 真恐怖,太意外了(假装震惊或惊讶时说)
def_en: You can say shock horror! in reaction to something that other people may find shocking or surprising, to indicate that you do not find it shocking or surprising at all.
